Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.client.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageVisitor
    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageVisitor
    The central node of the client, connects the user interface, the network interface and the small match representation It is responsible of taking updates from the server, updating the small match, presenting to the user the match status taking user's choices and sending them to the server
